
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define sz(q) (int(q.size()))
#define m make_pair 
#define pb push_back 
#define eb emplace_back 
#define fi first
#define se second

typedef uint64_t LL;
typedef pair<int, int> PII;
typedef pair<LL, LL> PLL;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        LL s, e;
        cin >> s >> e;
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        bool ok = 1;
        while (n--) {
            LL a, b;
            cin >> a >> b;
            ok &= (b <= s || a >= e);
        }
        if (ok) cout << "YES\n"; else cout << "NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
